CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, October 31, 1953, pg. 37, reads: "At McLeod Hearing - Part of the capacity crowd during the injunction hearing for the Rev. L.G. McLeod, the center of a factional struggle at Cosmopolitan Baptist Church of the North Side, are pictured as they stood in hallway of common Please Court last Friday after Judge Thomas M. Marshall recessed the court. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Man, and eight women, including woman wearing light colored plaid suit jacket, gathered in corridor during recess in Rev. L. G. McLeod injunction hearing at Allegheny County Courthouse
